notes: JSON terminology brackets are [], braces are{}, parenthesese are() and carrots are <>
JSON files always start with an array [] or an object {}
JSON files cannot have comments, so put comments in this array
commas go between items in an array or object, but there should never be a trailing comma
All property names must be in quotation marks
All string quotation marks must be double quotes
Use a linter like jsonlint.com to check json
